attributes.action: Steve Bray to be nominated for an MBE.
attributes.additional_details: Steve Bray has selfless devoted the last few years of his life to promoting the interests of the country when the government's of the day have been determined to destroy the economic advantages that have been gained through membership of the European Union.
attributes.background: Site Bray should be recognised by the award of an MBE for his efforts to keep the UK in the European Union.
